title: The structures shall be reflected in the true extract of Revenue Record prior to 1961-62 or in the assessment records prior to datum line as mentioned (a) above
clause_text: The structures shall be reflected in the true extract of Revenue Record prior to 1961-62 or in the assessment records prior to datum line as mentioned (a) above.
section: Removal and re-accommodation of tolerated /protected structures falling in the alignment of road: -
